message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. After considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we meet somewhere in between these prices?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is quite valuable to me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $11,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I must respectfully decline. I believe $10,000 is the maximum I can afford for this product. Could you consider a price closer to my budget?

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $10,000 is my absolute lowest price. I believe this product is worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it at this price.  What do you say?
